title: CLEAR_PED_PROP
content:
0x0943E5B8E078E76E0x2D23D743// ClearPedProp
void CLEAR_PED_PROP(Ped ped, int propId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.propId: The prop id you want to clear from the ped. Refer to SET_PED_PROP_INDEX.
codeBlocks:
// ClearPedProp
void CLEAR_PED_PROP(Ped ped, int propId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for CLEAR_PED_PROP
ClearPedProp(ped, 0)
